backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing locked foundation behavior and related UI files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend Solitaire files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind and OKLCH-based theme definitions for light and dark modes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying dark theme and rendering SolitairePage.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/componen: Card renderer supporting locked state, drag behavior, suit colors, and visual highlighting.
UI bar providing New Game, Undo, and Hint buttons.
Generic pile renderer managing card layout, locked foundations, and drag-drop zones.
Modal dialog showing a win message and restart button.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Implements drag payload serialization, validation, and extraction for solitaire card dragging, blocking foundation-origin drags.
Scans game state to find the next valid solitaire move, excluding moves from foundations.
Provides undo history management with functions to push, pop, and check undo availability.
Contains core solitaire rules including deck creation, shuffling, dealing, move validation, and stock drawing.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/Solitair: Main Solitaire UI handling game interactions, enforcing locked foundations, and managing drag-drop and hints.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Defines card, game state, selection, drag, and hint types plus helper ranking and suit utilities.
Checks if all foundation piles are complete to determine a win.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/useSolit: React reducer and logic wrapper managing game state, moves, hints, undo, and win detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and updates a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, persistence, and context management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating solitaire has no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based theme variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility for merging Tailwind class names cleanly.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCH color system, custom animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the solitaire project's state, feature set, issues, and architectural notes for building and fixing a Klondike game with dark theme UI.
